overview: With unprecedented access, this documentary chronicles a year in the life of Australian sporting superstar, Tim Cahill, in the lead up to one of the biggest events on the planet - the soccer World Cup. Honest, revealing, emotional and funny, 'Tim Cahill : The Unseen Journey' offers a rare insight into the life of a professional player.
tagline: The never-told story about Tim Cahill
title: Tim Cahill: The Unseen Journey
